text: The Cathedral of Our Lady of the Holy Assumption (), better known as Valladolid Cathedral, is a Roman Catholic cathedral in Valladolid, Spain. It was designed by Juan de Herrera. ==Images== Image:227021542 3b4805c63c b.jpg|view from Plaza Mayor Image:Calle Regalado y Catedral de Valladolid - Encuentro en Valladolid julio de 2012 (148).JPG| from Regalado Street Image:Valladolid catedral 15 lou.jpg|Main view Image:Catedral de Valladolid.
